sentences.english: Tops nanna getting her grand-kiddy a soy milk treat.
sentences.chinese: 奶奶給她的孫女買一個豆奶點心。

sentences.english: Naturally the article supplies the production of Instant Rhedioda -Soybeen Milk Powder with reliable theoretical basis and clear practical guide.
sentences.chinese: 爲速溶紅景天豆奶粉的生產提供了理論與實踐的指導。

sentences.english: Our soy formula proven to reduce fussiness and gas.
sentences.chinese: 我們的豆奶配方奶粉可以減少寶寶的吵鬧和脹氣。

sentences.english: Feeding babies with a so-called lactose allergy soy milk is an absolute disaster.
sentences.chinese: 用乳糖過敏豆奶來餵養嬰兒絕對是一個災難。

sentences.english: Try switching to soy milk or almond milk.
sentences.chinese: 嘗試改用豆奶或杏仁乳。

sentences.english: eg: I drink a cup of soymilk every morning.
sentences.chinese: 我每天早晨喝一杯豆奶。

sentences.english: Similac Isomil Go and Grow is recommended as a supplement to age-appropriate solid foods.
sentences.chinese: 雅培豆奶二段奶粉推薦和固體食物一起食用。

sentences.english: Simply add soymilk or almond milk, and you have a blockbuster breakfast!
sentences.chinese: 如果僅加入豆奶或杏仁奶，那麼早餐便已足夠健康。

sentences.english: Some fortified cereal, soy milk, and nutrition yeast are vegetarian sources of this vitamin.
sentences.chinese: 一些強化穀物，豆奶和營養是這種維他命的素食來源。

sentences.english: Please feel free to have some sugar-free soybean milk.
sentences.chinese: 請隨意喝點無糖豆奶吧。

sentences.english: Milk. Drink fortified soymilk, rice milk or almond milk in place of cow's milk.
sentences.chinese: 可用強化豆奶，穀物奶或者杏仁奶替代牛奶。

sentences.english: A fermented drink was made from ground beans by adding acidity additive, it can improve special flavor of the acid juice.
sentences.chinese: 在常飲的豆奶中加入酸味劑，能改善豆奶的風味。

sentences.english: A fermented drink was made from ground beans by adding acidity additive, it can improve special flavor of the acid juice.
sentences.chinese: 在常飲的豆奶中加入酸味劑，能改善豆奶的風味。

sentences.english: Soy milk and yogurt are great because they are very low in saturated fat.
sentences.chinese: 豆奶和酸奶含有極低的飽和脂肪，對健康非常有益。
